So, what do you want to do when we get there?
We have got to try out some real Italian cuisine first.
Hey listen.
I looked up some stores.
Hey, is not he from Trapnest?!
- Huh?
Who? - Ren?
No, the long-haired one.
Really?
Where?
So where is Ren?
I am sick of eating bread for breakfast every day.
I want some miso soup.
Oh, I found this great Japanese restaurant.
Want To go there tonight?
I want some of Nana's salty miso soup!
Ren, keep your voice down.
Ren, you are better off forgetting about women like that.
Women like that?
While we are on the subject, I will be blunt with you.
I believe Nana is the type of girl she is rumored to be
and you are really being fooled by her.
If she loved you,
she would be more careful about the salt content in her cooking...
Take, let me go back to Japan earlier too.
That is not fair just Takumi got to go.
No, you still have your photo shoot.
Besides, he had his reasons.
What?
Takumi's returning early?
He is already left.
Yesterday.
What is with that?!
Why did not he say anything about it?!
He should have arrived in Japan by now.
He is so cold...
Mom, I am off to check in at the hotel.
If Mr. Ichinose's coming to see us tomorrow anyway,
he should have stayed over.
But he will be arriving pretty late,
so he did not want to inconvenience anyone.
He should not be so formal.
He is going to be family.
They are seeing each other for the first time in half a month.
Of course they want some time alone.
Oh, I guess you are right.
I am sure looking forward to tomorrow.
Talking with him over the phone, Takumi seems like a really nice person.
Huh?
When did you talk to him?
I answered the phone when he called from overseas.
Dad is prejudiced when it comes to celebrities
saying they are as bad as the yakuza
but even he was praising Takumi on his manners.
Really?
But he is like a yakuza though.
HE IS GOT YOU FOOLED.
HE IS GOT YOU FOOLED.
Is that so?
HE IS GOT YOU FOOLED.
HE IS GOT YOU FOOLED.
If he actually was a gangster, he would take over the world.
If he actually was a gangster, he would take over the world.
He is so cutthroat.
Then God must have given him musical talent
to keep him on the right path in life.
The world of entertainment seems glamorous,
but I am sure it is pretty difficult.
It will be your job to create a home where he can relax.
So stop slacking off and do your best.
Mhm.
By the way, how is Nana doing?
Have you been keeping in touch?
No.
I hear that Nana broke her cell phone.
So I have not been able to call or email her.
And she has not called me.
I see.
That is a bit worrisome, is not it?
Yeah.
But from what my other friends are telling me,
she seems to be in extremely high spirits and working hard.
Extremely?
That is my Nana!
She is a tough girl!
I was so frantic to give Hachi the chance to see me out there singing.
It never occurred to me to ask how she was doing.
About her child, or about Takumi...
Honestly speaking, I did not want to know.
Although that was just me being jealous.
You have not even touched your breakfast.
Are you feeling sick?
No...
Hey, Mari.
I wonder if Takumi met up with Stella.
Huh?
I-I do not know.
But we have been so busy, I doubt he had time to sleep around.
He raced through his schedule for his fiancee, after all.
That is awful.
Huh?
Well, that might be okay for his fiancee,
but Stella has been Takumi's lover for a lot longer!
Ah, is that so?
She might have even been secretly dreaming of marrying Takumi some day.
I feel sorry for Stella.
SUBJECT: IT IS ME, SHIN
You sure are amazing, Reira.
Huh?
To be able to see things from so many different perspectives like that.
I was only thinking of the feelings of Takumi's fiancee.

that captivate the general public sure is different.
You overestimate me, Mari.
It is just a matter of whose feelings I can empathize with more.
I am a selfish person who only thinks of herself.
I have no idea how Stella really feels at all.

Hey Ren, has Naoki told you about Yasu?
What is that baldy up to?
I guess Search published an expose about him.
Naoki says there are rumors about it all over the internet.
An expose about what?
All kinds of things.
Apparently he hit a Search reporter to protect his vocalist,
and was taken in for questioning by the police.
Then, other magazines started saying
that Nana and Yasu are actually dating and things like that.
That is just not possible.
It is all lies.
In addition, Search also wrote that Yasu's not a real lawyer
since he does not have a license to practice law.
Is not that horrible?
That is horrible.
Um, Reira...
Oh, thank you.
You know, I have been concerned about those rumors too.
Is it possible Mr. Takagi never served as a law apprentice for a firm?
What is a law apprentice?
It would be equivalent to a medical intern.
After passing the bar exam,
you must serve as a law apprentice for a year and a half
before you can become a real lawyer.
You really know a lot, Mari!
More like you do not know anything.
What about you?!
Well, it is not exactly common knowledge.
I am a law school graduate.
That is amazing!
You are not just wearing those glasses for show.
No, there is nothing amazing about it.
And these glasses are just for show.
Then what are you doing being Reira's babysitter?
What do you mean, babysitter?!
You know, like changing your diapers...
She does not!
Enough about me.
No.
I want to know more about you.
Are you free tonight?
Why do all our members try to seduce every woman they see?!
Are you Italian?!
Anyway, so that is why Yasu said he was a trainee.
So I guess he is in the midst of his so-called apprenticeship.
But it is been a year and a half since he graduated,
so he could already be a lawyer!
No, once you become an apprentice,
you must go where you have been assigned.
He would have had no say as to where he would be assigned.
If he were devoted to the band, it would have been difficult.
His mentor probably saw Mr. Takagi's abilities
and hired him through the office and had him do only desk work.
Mari, can you come here?!
Yes!
Mr. Takagi probably could not give up his dreams for the band.
The fact that he hit that reporter shows just how much he cares for his band members.
No matter what the public says,
I think Reira's boyfriend is a wonderful man.
Do not pay attention to the rumors, and keep your spirits high.
Mari?
Yes!
Boyfriend?
What does that mean?
Was not Yasu's dream to be a lawyer?
It is always been secrets and lies.
Since the old days, I never knew what he was thinking.
I have no intention of making a living on music,
and I do not plan on ever leaving this town.
So I guess there is nothing we can do about it.
If the band is that important to him,
was that just an excuse to break up with me?
No, he did not go that far for the sake of the band.
This may be a problem.
I could no longer sacrifice that much for Nana.
I wonder why.
I still love her like I always have.
Hey, Ren.
If I died, would you die with me?
When did I become such a cold person?

Oh, Mr. Illegal Lawyer.
What are you working on, hiding in the dark?
Same goes for you.
You should not be walking outside alone in the middle of the night.
It is dangerous.
It is all because that raccoon told us about the guerrilla live performances.
I got too excited to sleep.
Sleep while you have the chance.
Once we get back to Tokyo, we will be really busy promoting our music.
Want To sleep with me?
Sure.
Why not.
That was a joke.
That was not funny.
Because you are in love with me.
You are right.
Now that I have laid all my cards on the table,
there is no point in denying it.
Was I too obvious?
You are damn right, baldy.
What in the world are you up to?
I am not really up to anything,
so you stop worrying and just focus on singing.
But, Yasu.
Ever since Ren and I broke up back home two and a half years ago,
I have felt closer to you than to Ren.
Even when I am with Ren, I am still feeling a bit lonely.
He and I can no longer become one like we used to.
Why is that?
I still love Ren like I always have.
Mai, Yui, Sumire, Akane.

And it looks prettier with the last name,
which uses three kanji characters.
Like Takumi.

No way!

the night sky looks awfully bright tonight too.
Even now, when I see something sparkling,
it reminds me of Ren.

I am alone
